segments.text: I want a suit of workmanship and suitable for formal meetings.Would you recommend some brands ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about these famous brands ? Such as pierre Cardin ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid that's a bit beyond my means .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then you can try some local products.They ' re also of good quality .
segments.speaker: S2
